content: Has anyone experienced resources disappearing? In my installations of HAPI, the search results indicate (for example) a total of 100 resources... When I page through the resources and get to page 3 (again, for example) the search/page results will only return 2 out of the expected 20 resources. It's like the resources just disappeared.

This isn't something I have ever experienced.

Is it consistent? E.g. does the same search give the same results if you do it again (especially with the Cache-Control: no-cache header to ensure you're not getting cached results)?

Are there actually results that should have been returned and weren't, or is it possible there is a problem with the count?
